channel.title: Can you help me with a custom item problem please
channel.description: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I CAN WEAR CUSTOM ITEMS IN THE RIGHT PLACE CAN YOU HELP ME ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ When i wear custom items they appear up in the wepon slot Like admin armour i cant wear in armour slots only where my wep is held HEEELLLLLPPPP please i really need the help Thanks guyz
